text:
Alain Bui, born in 1969, is a French doctor, specialized in information technology. He is President of the "Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines" since October 2017.
Graduate from the Paris Diderot University in information technology, he starts his career at University of Picardie Jules Verne in 1995. He moved to CNRS in 2003.
On October 2017, he is elected President of the "Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines", succeeding Didier Guillemot.
